title: Exceptional Prices Paid for Ultra High Grade Rare Cards
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Exceptional Prices Paid for Ultra High Grade Rare Cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind
Our life long quest to secure the best  type set examples extant continues

Whilst we have enjoyed much success from our recent Network 54
marketing efforts, we still have much to accomplish

Top prices paid for cards we need on the list below.
Please note our preference is for non- Hall of Famers.


Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List

All contact should be made privately.

Confidentiality assured. Please write to

bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com


WANT LIST- (equivalent SGC grade welcomed)
We are not interested in examples with qualifiers

T 204- PSA 8
T 208- PSA 5 and above
T209 Color- PSA 7 and PSA 8
T216- PSA 6 and above
T 217- Mono- PSA 5 and above
E 93- PSA 7 and above
E 94- PSA 7 and above
E 97- PSA 7 and above
E 100- PSA 5 and above
E 106 PSA 5 and above
E 300- PSA 7 and above
Texas Tommy- PSA 5 and above
E145 Cracker Jack- Federal League only PSA 8 and above
Lections- PSA 5 and above
Delongs (have 4) - PSA 8 and above
